long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily change your Harvest invoice/estimate language translations.

Check out the list of supported languages on https://github.com/orestes/harvest-languages

This extension is Free and Open Source Software. 

The full source code is available at https://github.com/orestes/harvest-languages
Report issues at https://github.com/orestes/harvest-languages/issues

**Disclaimer**

I do not work for Harvest nor am I affiliated with them in any way. This is not an officially supported solution, just a hack.
